revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=Technologic Systems |model=TS-4100 |revision=-SMN1I Rev. B |is_manuf=No |price=189 |est_release_date=02/2018 |type=SoM |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=USB Female Micro-B |cpu1_brand=NXP |cpu1_model=i.MX6UL;MCIMX6G2AVM07AD; |cpu1_cspeed=396 |fla1=4 GiB |fla1_brand=Micron |fla1_model=MTFC4GACAJCN-4M IT |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Intelligent Memory |ram1_model=IM4G16D3E |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 (OTG) |expansion_usb_num=2 |serial=yes,, console port,, USB Micro-B (Female),, (115200 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Microchip |eth_chip2_model=KSZ8081 |eth_chip3_brand=Microchip |eth_chip3_model=KSZ8081 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=2 |addl_chips=8-bit MCU;Silicon Labs;C8051F381-GM;;1;,,, FPGA w/ 4K LUTs;Lattice;LCMX02-4000;;1;,,, 2A 1MHz Synchronous Step-Down Converter;Richtek;RT8097;;1;,,, Dual Inverter with Schmitt Trigger Inputs;ON Semi;NC7WZ14;;2;,,, Reset Circuit;STMicro;STM1001;;1; |flags=Micro SD Card slot, FPGA, ADC, I2C, I2S, GPIO |stock_boot=U-Boot;2016.03; |stock_os=Linux;4.1.15;Debian 8; }} {{TagLine|Ultra Low Power Stand Alone IoT-Ready SoM}} :[https://www.embeddedts.com/products/TS-4100 Product page]
===Documentation=== *[https://docs.embeddedts.com/TS-4100 ''Computer-on-Module Documentation''] *[https://github.com/embeddedTS ''Code Respository'']
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[NXP]] i.MX6UL (MCIMX6G2AVM07AD) :ARM (Cortex-A7) @396MHz *Storage: 4GB (eMMC) Flash, :TF card (max.128GB)/MMC card slot *Memory: 512MB (DDR3) SDRAM *USB: 2x USB 2.0 (OTG) ports *Network: 2x FE ports via connector *Power Source: 5V/2A via USB Female Micro-B
==Images== <gallery> File:Technologic Systems TS-4100 Top.jpeg|Board Top File:Technologic Systems TS-4100 Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
